game.name: Moto X3M Bike Race Game
game.description:
Are you a lover of BMX bikes? Do you think that you have the skill to race your bike through multiple challenging levels? Join Moto X3M Bike Race game right away and show off the world that no one can beat you in driving a motorcycle through amazing off road circuits! Grab your bike along with a lovely helmet and get ready to perform a few death-defying stunts while dealing with some deadly obstacles! Complete your task as fast as you can to secure all 3 stars!

There are 25 unique, highly addictive and challenging levels to play through in this one of the best racing games. Control the acceleration and deceleration with the help of arrow keys! Do not forget to tilt your bike if needed to avoid the unwanted crash on the way. Use your intense driving abilities to ride through each course and make sure to land your jumps in the best way possible! You will lose your game immediately in case if your bike gets crashed by angling it incorrectly.

In this awesome HTML5 bike game, you would meet with different obstacles and objects in each level. Try to perform some cool stunts like backflips and frontflips perfectly to achieve 3 stars in all levels! This fabulous motorcycle driving game features fabulous gameplay, eye-popping level design, and easy controls. Complete several levels to unlock new cool bikes and riders! Good luck to have a wonderful adventure through the city areas, caves and beach!
